title: The $120 Phone Challenge
description: Do you REALLY need to spend $500+ on a smartphone? Probably not. Moto X4 on Amazon:  Google Pixel 3a on Amazon:  You should be subscribed to Zack:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
